languages.text: Светлая память об Абеляре была омрачена лишь слухами о его умопомрачении на склоне лет. Многие утверждали, что видели, как досточтимый сенешаль беседовал с кем-то незримым, и голос его был наполнен нетипичной для него нежностью и тоской.

Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.
languages.original_text: Светлая память об Абеляре была омрачена лишь слухами о его умопомрачении на склоне лет. Многие утверждали, что видели, как досточтимый сенешаль беседовал с кем-то незримым, и голос его был наполнен нетипичной для него нежностью и тоской.

traits.locale_text: The bright memory of Abelard was darkened only by rumours of the crawling madness in the twilight of his life. Many stated that they saw the honoured Seneschal talk to someone unseen, with a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德出色的记忆力在晚年逐渐衰退，以至于有谣言说他疯了。许多人声称，他们看到尊敬的总领和某个看不见的人说话，他的声音里充满了不同寻常的温柔和悲伤。
languages.original_text: Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德的记忆力在晚年逐渐衰退，以至于有谣言说他疯了。许多人声称，他们看到尊敬的总领和某个看不见的人说话，他的声音里充满了不同寻常的温柔和悲伤。

languages.text: Die strahlende Erinnerung an Abelard wurde nur von Gerüchten verdunkelt, dass ihn im Alter ein schleichender Wahnsinn befallen hatte. Manche sagten, sie hätten den ehrenwerten Truchsess mit einer unsichtbaren Person sprechen sehen, mit ungewohnt zärtlicher, aber auch trauriger Stimme.
languages.original_text: Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

traits.locale_text: Die hellen Erinnerungen an Abelard wurden nur von Gerüchten verdunkelt, dass ihn im Alter ein schleichender Wahnsinn befallen hatte. Manche sagten, sie hätten den ehrenwerten Truchsess mit einer unsichtbaren Person sprechen sehen, mit einer ungewohnt zärtlichen, aber auch traurigen Stimme.

languages.text: La glorieuse réputation d'Abélard fut ternie par des rumeurs de folie surgie au crépuscule de sa vie. Beaucoup jurèrent avoir surpris l'estimé sénéchal discuter d'une voix inhabituellement tendre et triste avec un interlocuteur invisible.
languages.original_text: Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

traits.locale_text: La glorieuse réputation d'Abélard fut salie par des rumeurs de folie surgie au crépuscule de sa vie. Beaucoup jurèrent avoir surpris l'honorable sénéchal discuter d'une voix inhabituellement tendre et triste avec un interlocuteur invisible.

languages.text: El recuerdo brillante de Abelard solo quedó empañado por los rumores de la locura en sus últimos años de vida. Muchos aseguraron ver al estimado Senescal hablando con una persona invisible, con la voz cargada de una ternura y una pena muy inusuales.
languages.original_text: Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

traits.locale_text: El recuerdo brillante de Abelard solo quedó empañado por los rumores de la locura en sus últimos años de vida. Muchos aseguraron ver al honorable Senescal hablando con una persona invisible, con la voz cargada de una ternura y una pena muy inusuales.

languages.text: アベラルドの輝かしい記憶は、彼の人生の黄昏時に這い寄った狂気の噂によってのみ傷つけられた。多くの人が、名誉ある家令長が見えない誰かと、異常なまでの優しさと悲しみに満ちた声で話しているのを見たと述べていた。
languages.original_text: Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

traits.locale_text: アベラルドの輝かしい記憶は、彼の人生の黄昏時に這い寄った狂気の噂によってのみ傷つけられた。多くの人が、名誉ある家令長が見えない誰かと、異常なまでの優しさと悲しみに満ちた声で話しているのを見たと述べていた。

languages.text: Abelard'ın ışıl ışıl hatırasına gölge düşüren tek şey, yaşamının sonbaharında deliliğe sürüklendiğine dair söylentilerdi. Birçokları, saygıdeğer Seneşal'in muazzam derecede şefkat ve hüzünle dolu bir sesle, görünmez biriyle konuştuğunu gördüklerini söylüyordu.
languages.original_text: Abelard's shining memory was blighted only by rumours of a creeping madness in the twilight of his life. Many said they had seen the esteemed Seneschal talking to someone unseen, in a voice filled with unusual tenderness and sorrow.

traits.locale_text: Abelard'ın ışıl ışıl hatırasına gölge düşüren tek şey, yaşamının sonbaharında deliliğe sürüklendiğine dair söylentilerdi. Birçokları, saygıdeğer Seneşal'in, muazzam derecede şefkat ve hüzünle dolu bir sesle, görülmeyen biriyle konuştuğunu gördüklerini söylüyordu.
